content: A few people have expressed interest in contributing to the enhancement of the IG templates. To that end, I'm holding a session on Thursday Feb. 4 at 6pm Eastern to go over how the templates are currently set up and to talk about approach for submitting proposed changes as well as our overall objectives for the templates. I'll record the session and pop a link here when it's done. Discussion over on the base #committers stream. Zoom link: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/8583747934?pwd=VnZiWFZsNm1TSk5QWmZlbVJyQVZGdz09

Recording of today's call is here: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/rec/share/rvpxaiThkLEhRNZKm2p_7EhuNiyCrluQA4F8NzrtRjMZNnq3sDNMX9AtHANgqRlz.hQaKLnH68MIX0gGg
Password: bKWk%50=

We're planning to have a follow-up call, same time and coordinates next week (Feb. 11)
is there a call today (technically the call takes place tomorrow for some of us) ?
